{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cephalosporins are a type of antibiotic and are divided into generations based on their spectrum of antimicrobial activity. Cefuroxime is a second-generation cephalosporin, Cefoxitin is also a second-generation cephalosporin, and Cefadroxil is a first-generation cephalosporin. Cefoperazone, on the other hand, is a third-generation cephalosporin.", "answer_choice": "A"}
